action_title: Treat mammals to reduce conflict caused by disease transmission to humans
key_messages:
Key Messages:

One study evaluated the effects of treating mammals to reduce conflict caused by disease transmission to humans. This study was in Germany.

COMMUNITY RESPONSE (0 STUDIES)
POPULATION RESPONSE (0 STUDIES)
BEHAVIOUR (0 STUDIES)
OTHER (1 STUDY)

Human-wildlife conflict (1 study): A controlled, before-and-after study in GermanyÂ found that following a worming programme, proportions of red foxes infested with small fox tapeworm fell.
